verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall We Say <S%G2046><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Our <S%G3962><s%> Father <S%G2257><s%> Has Found <S%G2147><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh? <S%G4561><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Was Justified, <S%G1344><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Ground Of Boasting <S%G2745><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Says? <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4100><s%> And Believed <S%G1161><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

Now <S%G3588><s%> To Him That <S%G1161><s%> Works <S%G2038><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> But <S%G235><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Debt : <S%G3783><s%>

But To Him <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> Does Not Work, <S%G2038><s%> But Believes <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G1909><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Justifies <S%G1344><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ungodly, <S%G765><s%> Is Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> His <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Faith <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Declares <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blessedness <S%G3108><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Reckons <S%G3049><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Works : <S%G2041><s%>

Blessed They <S%G3107><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Are Forgiven <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lawlessness <S%G458><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Are Covered, <S%G1943><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins : <S%G266><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The Man <S%G435><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> In <S%G3756><s%> No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Will Reckon The <S%G3049><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Sin. <S%G266><s%>

Is This <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3108><s%> Blessedness <S%G3767><s%> Then <S%G3778><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Uncircumcision? <S%G203><s%> We Say <S%G3004><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Was Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Was It Reckoned? <S%G3049><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Uncircumcision? <S%G203><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Uncircumcision. <S%G203><s%>

And The <S%G2532><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> He Received <S%G2983><s%> Of Circumcision, As <S%G4061><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> The Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Which He Had <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G1511><s%> Be <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> ' In <S%G1223><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Be Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> All <S%G2532><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Only, <S%G3440><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Walk <S%G4748><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Steps <S%G2487><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Our <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Father <S%G2257><s%> Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise Was <S%G1860><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Seed, <S%G4690><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Heir <S%G2818><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Should Be <S%G1511><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> But <S%G235><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Of Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Law Be <S%G3551><s%> Heirs, <S%G2818><s%> Has Been Made Void <S%G2758><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made Of No Effect <S%G2673><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise. <S%G1860><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> Works Out; <S%G2716><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> Neither Is <S%G3761><s%> Transgression. <S%G3847><s%>

Where <S%G1223><s%> Fore <S%G5124><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> It Is, That <S%G2443><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Grace It Might Be, <S%G5485><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Be <S%G1511><s%> Sure <S%G949><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seed, <S%G4690><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To That <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To That <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Faith Of <S%G4102><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Us <S%G3956><s%> All, <S%G2257><s%>

according As <S%G2531><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> A 3754 CONJ Father 3962 N-ASM Of Many 4183 A-GPN Nations 1484 N-GPN I Have Made 5087 V-RAI-1S Thee, 4571 P-2AS Before 2713 ADV Whom 3739 R-GSM He Believed 4100 V-AAI-3S God, 2316 N-GSM Who 3588 T-GSM Quickens 2227 V-PAP-GSM The 3588 T-APM Dead, 3498 A-APM And 2532 CONJ Calls 2564 V-PAP-GSM The Things 3588 T-APN Not 3361 PRT-N Being 5607 V-PXP-APN As 5613 ADV Being; 5607 V-PXP-APN

Who <S%G3739><s%> ' Against <S%G3844><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Believed, <S%G4100><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Become <S%G1096><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Many <S%G4183><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Said, <S%G2046><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Shall <S%G2071><s%> Be <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4690><s%> Thy Seed : <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Being Weak <S%G770><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> He Considered <S%G2657><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G1438><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Become Dead, <S%G3499><s%> A Hundred Years Old <S%G1541><s%> About <S%G4225><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deadening <S%G3500><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Womb Of <S%G3388><s%> Sarah, <S%G4564><s%>

And <S%G1519><s%> At <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Doubted <S%G1252><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Through Unbelief; <S%G570><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Was Strengthened <S%G1743><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Being Fully Assured <S%G4135><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Has Promised, <S%G1861><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Do; <S%G4160><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> It Was Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

It Was <S%G3756><s%> Not Written <S%G1125><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Was Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Be Reckoned, <S%G3049><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Raised <S%G1453><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Our <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> From <S%G2257><s%> Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Delivered <S%G3860><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> Our Offences <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Raised <S%G1453><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1347><s%> Our Justification. <S%G2257><s%>
